metadata.title: Beethoven: Symphony No. 8
metadata.description: Beethoven; Symphony No. 8 in F Major. Arturo Toscanini conducting the NBC Symphony Orchestra. Recorded in April 1939 in New York City in Studio 8H of Rockefeller Center. Transfered and restored from the original 78 set, RCA DM 908.
metadata.subject: Beethoven; Toscanini; Symphony
metadata.creator: Restoration by Bob Varney
